LC6VMAX4 Kate - redirect
1 (Witness present)
2 THE COURT: You may remove your mask. We'll have the jury in in a moment.
3 Ms. Pomerantz, if you want to go to the podium and set
4 up, you may.
5 MS POMERANTZ: Thank you, your Honor.
6 THE COURT: Thank you.
7 Just while we're waiting, just to flag, counsel, if
8 you look at 911 and 913, it looks like there's photos that
9 might need additional redaction.
10 (Jury present)
11 THE COURT: Thank you, members of the jury.
12 I hope you had a pleasant lunch.
13 We're going to pick up with the redirect examination
14 of the witness identified as Kate.
15 Ms. Pomerantz, when you're ready.
16 And Kate, I remind you that you are under oath.
17 Go ahead.
18 REDIRECT EXAMINATION
19 BY MS. POMERANTZ:
20 Q. Good afternoon, Kate.
21 A. Good afternoon.
22 Q. Can you just pull the microphone a little bit closer to you please?
23 A. Is that good?
24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
25 DOJ-OGR-00012884

text_blocks.content:
(Witness present)
THE COURT: You may remove your mask. We'll have the jury in in a moment.
Ms. Pomerantz, if you want to go to the podium and set
up, you may.
MS POMERANTZ: Thank you, your Honor.
THE COURT: Thank you.
Just while we're waiting, just to flag, counsel, if
you look at 911 and 913, it looks like there's photos that
might need additional redaction.
(Jury present)
THE COURT: Thank you, members of the jury.
I hope you had a pleasant lunch.
We're going to pick up with the redirect examination
of the witness identified as Kate.
Ms. Pomerantz, when you're ready.
And Kate, I remind you that you are under oath.
Go ahead.
REDIRECT EXAMINATION
BY MS. POMERANTZ:
Q. Good afternoon, Kate.
A. Good afternoon.
Q. Can you just pull the microphone a little bit closer to you please?
A. Is that good?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and readable format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
